name: CORDELIA SPENCER
profile: Seeking position in Information Systems or related field utilizing solid academic background along with exceptionally strong analytical, problem solving and customer service skills.
skills: Technical Support: Installation, Configuration & Troubleshooting of Hardware & Software
Languages: Visual Basic, C, C++, Visual C++, Java, HTML, XML, ASP.NET
Database Management: Relational Databases. SQL, PL/SQL, MS Access
Applications: MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook), MS Project

employment.responsibilities: Assisted in systems administration and configuration in UNIX and Windows NT. Installed and maintained local area networks, including Novell and Windows systems. Staffed Help Desk; analyzed and resolved system problems encountered by end users. Participated in the design and development of the department’s web site. Assisted with the maintenance of e-mail and other Internet applications.
Provided advice and guidance to college students on the effective use of PCs and various software applications.

trainings: BS in Computer Information Systems—Web-based Networking, Bellevue University, Bellevue NE
Associate of Applied Science, Metropolitan Community College, Omaha NE (20xx), Major: Management Information Systems
